name: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids uncover supernatural mysteries and a secret government lab in their small town.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind known as The Professor recruits a team to carry out heists on Spain’s Royal Mint and Bank.

name: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people can be more wicked than beasts.

name: Dark
description: A German town’s secrets unravel after a child’s disappearance exposes a mystery spanning four generations.
